FFr_EA4474CC.DisplayName.Text: ||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power

FFr_EA4474CC.DisplayName.Context: Flow/v01 Mission Structure - Mission Centric/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power

FFr_EA4474CC.Text.Text:
In this quest, the player/writer sets out to find a mythical narrative bible known as the Ehhh Aye*. Whoever wields the tome can use simple verbal prompts to generate narrative content guaranteed to make their game score 100% on Metacritic! 

Quest Outline: https://www.notion.so/chadbriggs/External-Lore-Page-Example-3c459c4d0ac842c99885f9059000c925?pvs=4



*See what I did there? Don't worry, there is a lot more where that came from! Hang on to yer knickers!

FFr_EA4474CC.Text.Context: Flow/v01 Mission Structure - Mission Centric/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power

DFr_15767B0E.Text.Text:
The safe is open! You've discovered:

-A last will and testament with markup and notes scrawled on it.

-A photograph of Daria and Alex

-Lab results from a DNA matching compnay.

Visit the Evidence List Kiosk to examine the items further.

DFr_15767B0E.Text.Context: Flow/||LOCATION - Crime Scene/Detective Siri/Alexa: "The safe is open! You've discovered..."

Use the Video Forensic Module to pull the videos off the device.

DFr_0985DFC6.Text.Text:
Gives injected heroin as cause of death. Daria used "Find my phone" after Victor was missing for Days, and body was found.

This evidence cannot be processed further.

DFr_0985DFC6.Text.Context: Flow/Dynaimic Node Data Test/Autopsy Report: "Gives injected heroin as cause of d..."

DFr_BB7750C2.Text.Text:
A series of legal documents from Victor's attorney with notes and markups detailing changes to Victor's will.

This evidence can be summarized with Document Analytics.

DFr_BB7750C2.Text.Context: Flow/Dynaimic Node Data Test/Updated Will: "A series of legal documents from Vi..."

DFr_2F7B7C50.Text.Text:
A last will and testament showing that Victor had distributed his estate as follows:

50% to Daria

25% to Alex

25% to Leo

This evidence cannot be processed further.

DFr_2F7B7C50.Text.Context: Flow/Dynaimic Node Data Test/Original Will: "A last will and testament showing t..."

DFr_8527DCB9.Text.Text:
I worked at the club for years while building my influencer career.

Victor is the father of my child and I confronted him about it.

If anyone has heroin it would be that druggie, Alex. He and Leo are close.

I have never heard of the love nest.

DFr_8527DCB9.Text.Context: Flow/Liza Statements/Liza: "I worked at the club for years whil..."

DFr_6F7DBF79.Text.Text:
Victor hated drugs.

I am a former worker at the club and slept with Victor.

Victor is not the father of my child, despite me thinking he was. It must be my other relationship.

Daria is having an affair with Alex.

DFr_6F7DBF79.Text.Context: Flow/Liza Statements/Liza: "Victor hated drugs. I am a forme..."

DFr_0DD10AB4.Text.Context: Flow/Liza Statements/Detective Siri/Alexa: "Attempt to contradict Liza?"

DFr_E1FDF29A.Text.Text: I stand by what I said!

DFr_E1FDF29A.Text.Context: Flow/Liza Statements/Liza: "I stand by what I said!"

DFr_F93BFB35.Text.Text: Liza has been to Victor's love nest before.

DFr_F93BFB35.Text.Context: Flow/Liza Statements/Liza: "Liza has been to Victor's love nest..."

DFr_54D3BCD8.Text.Text: Liza has been in Victor's love nest before.

DFr_54D3BCD8.Text.Context: Flow/Liza Statements/Liza: "Liza has been in Victor's love nest..."

DFr_00577F8B.Text.Text: Liza may benefit from the new will, as it prefers blood relatives.

DFr_00577F8B.Text.Context: Flow/Liza Statements/Liza: "Liza may benefit from the new will,..."

DFr_5F3B8E1A.Text.Text: Liza and her baby do not stand to financially benefit from the will.

DFr_5F3B8E1A.Text.Context: Flow/Liza Statements/Liza: "Liza and her baby do not stand to f..."

DFr_11F93C80.Text.Text:
Congratulations! You've cracked your first witness! You now know how to scan in evidence, analyze it, and build your case!

View the suspects updated statement and then go back to the crime scene to see if you missed any other evidence.

DFr_11F93C80.Text.Context: Flow/Liza Statements/Detective Siri/Alexa: "Congratulations! You've cracked you..."

DFr_BA66ABFE.Text.Text:
A document showing from a DNA testing lab with detailed scientific results of a paternity test. 

This evidence can be summarized with document analytics.

DFr_BA66ABFE.Text.Context: Flow/Dynaimic Node Data Test/Paternity Test: "A document showing from a DNA testi..."

DFr_3A29262A.Text.Text:
I have been working on divorcing Victor because of his affair.

Liza is a gold-digger and Victor wanted a genetic test as proof.

I don’t know why Leo would have left and that is suspicious.

I didn’t know he had a love nest.

DFr_3A29262A.Text.Context: Flow/Daria Statements/Daria: "I have been working on divorcing Vi..."

DFr_5DBB4533.Text.Text:
Victor hated drugs.

I have been working on divorcing Victor because of my affair with Alex.

I am not worried about the will, as I can still benefit in both versions.

Someone is under investigation. I thought it was about me and the irregularities in our finances, but it wasn’t. It was about Leo.

DFr_5DBB4533.Text.Context: Flow/Daria Statements/Daria: "Victor hated drugs. I have been..."

DFr_2A72556A.Text.Text: I stand by what I said!

DFr_2A72556A.Text.Context: Flow/Daria Statements/Daria: "I stand by what I said!"

DFr_8CB9502E.Text.Text:
I have reformed from my troubled ways.

Leo is doing well and is not in any trouble.

Victor often took care of me financially.

I didn’t know he had a love nest.

DFr_8CB9502E.Text.Context: Flow/Alex Statements/Alex: "I have reformed from my troubled wa..."

DFr_6E4D96A6.Text.Text:
Victor hated drugs, especially with my problems.
